At Facebook, it is our mission to give people the power to build a global community and bring the world closer together. My teams own all full-stack and distributed systems engineering recruiting for the Facebook Seattle site. We're a large, yet tight-knit and supportive team of sourcers, full cycle recruiters, and recruiting managers who are looking for software engineers who are builders at heart!Seattle is Facebook's fastest growing site and we need engineers who are passionate about our mission and care deeply about engineering and building community both within and outside of work. Sound like you? Apply today!https://www.facebook.com/careers
